subject: Example of AOP Unit testing
msgSnippet: For those interested, here is a method using AOP to inject mock objects into the code under test. This is particularly effective when unit testing J2EE

For those interested, here is a method using AOP to inject mock objects
into the code under test. This is particularly effective when unit
testing J2EE components and especially EJBs:

http://blogs.codehaus.org/people/vmassol/archives/000138.html

-Vincent
